description: A Dashboard to monitor Synology NAS

targets.query: SELECT last("raidStatus") FROM "raidTable" WHERE ("host" = 'Nukumori' AND "raidName" = 'Volume 1') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("usage_idle") * - 1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'Nukumori' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("storageIOLA1") FROM "storageIOTable" WHERE ("host" = 'Nukumori' AND "storageIODevice" =~ /^$disk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "storageIODevice" fill(null)
SELECT 100 - last("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'Nukumori' AND "cpu" =~ /cpu[0-99].*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT last(used) as used, last(cached) as cached, last(free) as free, last(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host = 'Nukumori' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT last("raidTotalSize") FROM "raidTable" WHERE ("host" = 'Nukumori' AND "raidName" = 'Volume 1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("raidFreeSize") FROM "raidTable" WHERE ("host" = 'Nukumori' AND "raidName" = 'Volume 1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("raidTotalSize") - last("raidFreeSize") FROM "raidTable" WHERE ("host" = 'Nukumori' AND "raidName" = 'Volume 1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.label: Server:
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp.SYNO" WITH KEY = "agent_host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ifTable" WITH KEY = "ifDescr" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host/ AND "ifDescr" =~ /^(bond|eth)/
list.label: Interface:
list.name: intf
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ifTable" WITH KEY = "ifDescr" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host/ AND "ifDescr" =~ /^(bond|eth)/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storageIOTable" WITH KEY = "storageIODevice" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host/
list.label: Disk:
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storageIOTable" WITH KEY = "storageIODevice" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host/

title: Nukumori
